attributes.additional_details:
My idea is to set up a fund called the BRITISH ECONOMY FUND. This is simply none other than a donation box set up in every supermarket, shop, bank and library where people can put any amount of money they have towards the country’s debt. If everyone put in a pound a week there would be over £50,000,000 a week towards the debt. There is no forcing people, there is no taxing, taking or imposing, just simply asking. I guarantee this will make more money than any government proposed plan to date and when everyone sees how we can unite for a better cause more and more will join the effort.

"if money is all they need why don’t they ask?”

Marcel Joseph Whyte
(facebook group: British Economy Fund)
